summary: All this does is make Vigilance into a Hyena.
descriptionHtml:
Vigilance is a canine companion that can be found around the Markarth stables. Once there, you will encounter a man by the name of Banning, who offers the option to buy the dog for 500 gold.

This mod makes that dog into a Hyena.

It will conflict with mods that turn Vigilance into other things, like my mod to turn Vigilance into a Durzog.

If you have the hearthfire dlc, you can adopt Vigilance.

Credits:

Nexus Creature Resource - Hyena
muppetpuppet (Moonpath to Elsweyr) - Hyena
author: Gendundrup
